explains: n. 俗人；外行人；门外汉

sentences.en: The new proposals affect both clergy and laity.
sentences.cn: 新的提案使神职人员和平信徒都会受到影响。

sentences.en: Clergy and laity alike are divided in their views.
sentences.cn: 神职人员和信众同样都观点各异。

sentences.en: The church and the laity were increasingly active in charity work.
sentences.cn: 教会与俗众越来越积极于慈善工作。
